attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: to be able to make decisions regarding the people of england. regarding all aspects of life in england, without any political interference (voting) from scottish & welsh MPs. giving us control over the vast sums of money sent to those two "countrys" to subsidise them.To promote "englishness" and make people feel proud of their Great nation.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
